Our Experties

Sensors

We have experience in developing custom sensors and products using sensors such as a microphone, an ultrasonic transducer, piezoelectric transducers,3d camera sensor, pressure sensors, temperature sensors, photodiode, force sensors, and biosensors like ECG, plethysmography, and pulse Oximeter Sensors etc.

Analog & Digital Electronics

We have the expertise and proprietary tools including amplifiers, filters, data acquisition boards to quickly develop analog hardware for signal conditioning and acquisitions.We have worked on hardware design, board bring-up and firmware development for various 8,16,32 bit microcontrollers and microprocessors for embedded systems.

Computing

We have experience in research & algorithm development of signal processing, data analysis, supervised classifications, machine learning, object identifications and tracking, various algorithms for computer vision applications to extract meaningful information from raw data.

IOT Application Development

We have capabilities for UX,UI,IOS and Android application,Full-stack application development for end to end IOT solution.
